net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.blocks.fuzzy

Class MembershipFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.exprtree.fun.AbstractPrimitive
      • net.sf.jclec.problem.classification.blocks.fuzzy.MembershipFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.exprtree.IPrimitive
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriangularMembershipFunction

    public abstract class MembershipFunction
extends net.sf.jclec.exprtree.fun.AbstractPrimitive
    Abstract class of a membership function. Comprises the interval domain, the complete set of labels available and the current label subset in use.
    Author:
    Alberto Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
